```{r}

table1 <-  student_df %>% 
  mmtable(table_data = value)  +
  header_top(student) +
  header_top_left(grade) +
  header_left(class) +
  header_left_top(subject)

table2 <-  student_df_3 %>% 
  mmtable(table_data = value)  +
  header_top(student) +
  header_top_left(grade) +
  header_left(class) +
 header_left_top(subject)

table1
table2
table1 + table1
table1 + table3


```
